title: I got banned
body: RIOT I wanna know how did I get banned? What was the reason? I spent all my money to buy the expensive skins and I just got banned without letting me know what was the reason? How unfair is that

replies.body: You should have received a reform card which is visible in the client when you log in.

so when i opened up my League and put my username and password all it says that "This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details". Riot didnt even declare what is the reason why did i get permanently suspended and i also checked my Account's email address but there was nothing in there !

In that case it was more than likely a manual ban or a pre/post game lobby chat ban, as they don't interact the best with the reform cards. Submit a ticket to player support requesting the reason for the ban.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Thank you very much for the help mate! I appreciate it :)
